channel.title: kdd2019 on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in kdd2019 on Memo Tut

item.title: Introduction of research proposal that won first place at KDDCUP 2019 and adoption
item.description: It is Docomo's Ochiai. In this article, we will introduce the [^1] initiative that won the 1st division of [KDD Cup](https://www.kdd.org/kdd2019/kdd-cup), a competition for data analysis held at KDD2019. I will. KDD Cup 2019 Overview The outline of KDD was introduced in previous article, so focus on KDD Cup here. I will explain. The KDD Cup is a data science competition attached to the KDD and has a tradition of first being 1997 and more than 20 years.

item.title: I analyzed the data of the soccer FIFA World Cup Russia tournament with soccer action
item.description: **This is the 18th day article of ADVENT CALENDER of NTT DOCOMO Service Innovation Department. ** Hello! This is Osugi from NTT DoCoMo. I spent soccer and futsal when I was a student, and now I am doing marketing related data analysis. Today, I’d like to introduce socceraction, a python package for soccer, by analyzing the game data from the 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia tournament. #Introduction socceraction is featured in the KDD2019 Appried Data Sciense Track Best Paper Award ”Actions Speak Louder than Goals: Valuing Player Actions in Soccer” [^1].
